subject: Hurricanes and Tropical Storms
Stanley Cup
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: In a series pitting teams whose styles are mirror images, it is only fitting that the N.H.L. Eastern Conference finals will come down to a seventh, deciding game.
snippet: In a series pitting teams whose styles are mirror images, it is only fitting that the N.H.L. Eastern Conference finals will come down to a seventh, deciding game.
